po_number_prefix.description: An optional prefix to this purchase order number. This allows the user to add the desired context to the PO number without needing to edit the sequential number that the system has generated

po_number.description: A human readable generated or manually entered ID assigned to the purchase order

po_number_suffix.description: An optional suffix to this purchase order number. This allows the user to add the desired context to the PO number without needing to edit the sequential number that the system has generated
